extendedInfo.description: Getting a Taxi cab especially in crowded places, also at night can be troublesome. Especially when you are shouting "TAXI" among a crowd. How the Taxi Cab driver knows that it is you who are shouting for a TaxiCab.  Your troubles are no more a problem with our handy TaxiCab App. No sending text, calling taxi service, going online.This simple and yet very useful android app will help you get the TaxiCab in no time. You do not have to yell or shout anymore just point and get a TaxiCab instantly.We are working on second version, which will make your life even better when it comes to getting a TaxiCab.Our Taxi app is most useful at night.  An app cannot be simpler then this, simple but useful.A must have for all and without any charge. Free App.

reviews.title: Awsome app
reviews.comment: Great idea and works. Great worj. And again no ads by edan apps.
reviews.author: Junaid Akhtar
